hackathon-rules: All participants agree that their participation in the Games4Health Game Jam will hold no one liable for any loss or damage.

hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Samsung Gear VR headset with controller
Wacom Intuos Art Pen and Touch digital graphics, drawing & painting tablet

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The top three teams will present their solutions at the University of Pittsburgh 3rd Annual Integrative Conference on Technology, Social Media, and Behavioral Health on November 3, 2017.  Babs Carryer, Director of Education and Outreach, Innovation Institute University of Pittsburgh, will present Games4Health awards.
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Presentation at the University of Pittsburgh 3rd Annual Integrative Conference on Technology, Social Media, and Behavioral Health

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The top three teams will receive one-on-one consulting with Innovation Institute Entrepreneurs in Residence on developing their solution into a commercial product
The top three teams will be automatically admitted into the University of Pittsburgh Blast Furnace program
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Automatic admittion into the University of Pittsburgh Blast Furnace program

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The winning team will have an opportunity to present their project during Pitt Innovation Week (the week of November 13th)
The winning team will be automatically entered into the 2nd round of Randall Family Big Idea Competition
hackathon-prizes.prize-title: Automatic entry into the 2nd round of Randall Family Big Idea Competition

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: The winning team will receive free admission to the 2018 Serious Play Conference

hackathon-location-address: Information Sciences Bldg, 135 N Bellefield Ave, Pittsburgh, PA 15213, USA
hackathon-description-header: Create games to address health conditions in teenagers and adolescents
